introduction:
Hey there! ðŸ‘‹ I'm Bryce, a passionate tech enthusiast exploring the realms of computer science while residing in the beautiful Utah County. Currently immersed in a computer science degree at Utah Valley University, I'm on an exciting journey toward finding my niche in the ever-evolving tech universe.

		Originally hailing from the Pacific Northwest and having traversed through different states, I've cultivated a love for diverse experiences and cultures. When not delving into the intricacies of code, you'll find me immersed in captivating video games, whipping up culinary wonders, or diving into the fantastical worlds of Warhammer 40k, Star Wars, and The Witcher.

		As a fervent learner, I'm always up for new challenges. Whether it's mastering programming languages like Python and Rust, or delving into the realms of 3D modeling in Blender, I'm fueled by the thrill of acquiring new skills.

		Join me on this journey as I navigate through the realms of technology, creativity, and exploration.

		Welcome to my digital space! ðŸš€

projects.title: Shared Storage Server
projects.description: Configured a server for multiple users. Implemented SSH connections as well as GUI for each user. Continued management and maintenance of the server in my home environment.

projects.description: Project utilizing a SQLite Database and a TKinter GUI to manage employee information.

projects.title: Gradebook Application â€” Python
projects.description: A program that assists in the grading calculation for a couple specific university assignments, and produces reports for the whole class.

jobs.title: Implemntations Specialist II
jobs.description: Utilize remote technologies to configure networked devices through physical and wireless methods. Onboard external clients to use networked devices and associated PoS software. Work with clients in answering questions and troubleshooting any issues with devices, software, or onboarding processes. Train new employees on current practices, policies, and customer service skills.

jobs.title: Night Shift Lead
jobs.description: Managed a team of 5 in performing cleaning, prepping, customer service, and product-making duties. Prepared reports for EoD, and trained new employees. Handled incoming online, drive-thru, and in-person orders

hobbies.note: I have built my own computers, and hope to run a repair shop someday.
Currently reading 'Drive Your Plow Over the Bones of the Dead' By Olga Tokarczuk. Love novels that challenge me in some way.

Current favorite movie is 'Everything Everywhere All At Once'. Others I love: 'Barbenheimer', 'Hunt for the Wilder People', 'Star Wars Episode 3: Revenge of the Sith', 'Spider-man: Into the Spider-Verse'
Used to perform regularly, but now just do it to make people think I'm cool occasionally
Current top games: Elden Ring, Yakuza 0, Titanfall 2, Fortnite, Baldur's Gate 3
Been slowly learning Japanese for about a year, writing and speaking
Currently GM my own game of Pathfinder, also am playing in another game as Morgan the Hexblade Warlock who may destroy the world if she's not careful
